events.message: I received my order last week but want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The reported issue was categorized under Refund after reviewing the customer's request and message content.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request and address any concerns you have.
Could you please provide the order number and reason for the refund so I can process your request more quickly?
The order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the item did not match the description and I am very disappointed.
We have reviewed your refund request and I can initiate the refund process immediately. You should receive your money back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for your quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been initiated successfully. Please feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for the excellent support and prompt handling of my case.
The support case has been closed after confirming the refund was processed and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
